description: Worked on developing and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js. Contributed to the design and implementation of new features. Participated in code reviews and collaborated with cross-functional teams.
Gained experience in web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Worked on small-scale projects and learned from senior developers.
Completed a summer internship and gained exposure to software development principles and methodologies.
Lead cross-functional teams to deliver complex software projects on time and within budget. Manage project resources, track progress, and communicate with stakeholders.
Utilized data analysis tools to extract insights from large datasets. Developed data visualizations and reports to support business decision-making.
Created technical documentation, including user manuals, tutorials, and API reference guides. Ensured that documentation was accurate, clear, and easy to understand.
Defined product vision and roadmap. Collaborated with development teams to prioritize features and ensure product alignment with business goals.
Designed and executed test cases to identify and report defects. Worked closely with development teams to ensure product quality.
